fromDayInTheFuture:
From the beginning of the day, 
${absFromDateOffset | number} ${absFromDateOffset | plural: 'day' : 'days'} in the future
fromDayInThePast:
From the beginning of the day, 
${absFromDateOffset | number} ${absFromDateOffset | plural: 'day' : 'days'} in the past
fromHoursInTheFuture: From ${absFromDateOffset | number} ${absFromDateOffset | plural: 'hour' : 'hours'} in the future
fromHoursInThePast: From ${absFromDateOffset | number} ${absFromDateOffset | plural: 'hour' : 'hours'} in the past
fromDate:
From the beginning of the day, 
${fromDateFilter | date}
toDayInTheFuture:
To the end of the day, 
${absToDateOffset | number} ${absToDateOffset | plural: 'day' : 'days'} in the future
toDayInThePast:
To the end of the day, 
${absToDateOffset | number} ${absToDateOffset | plural: 'day' : 'days'} in the past
toHoursInTheFuture: To ${absToDateOffset | number} ${absToDateOffset | plural: 'hour' : 'hours'} in the future
toHoursInThePast: To ${absToDateOffset | number} ${absToDateOffset | plural: 'hour' : 'hours'} in the past
toDate:
To the end of the day, 
${toDateFilter | date}
